event: Austronesian peoples settle the Malay Peninsula and Borneo
Srivijaya dominates regional maritime trade routes
Malacca Sultanate emerges as a major Islamic trading hub
Dutch replace Portuguese control of Malacca
British establish Penang as a trading post
Anglo-Dutch Treaty divides Malay and Indonesian spheres
British expand indirect rule over Malay states
Malaysia formed with Sabah and Sarawak
